response.overview: Colorado Springs, late 1970s. Ron Stallworth, an African American police officer, and Flip Zimmerman, his Jewish colleague, run an undercover operation to infiltrate the Ku Klux Klan.
response.title: BlacKkKlansman

titles.title: BlacKkKlansman: J'ai infiltré le Ku Klux Klan
